name: Abraham
description: First patriarch, father of nations. Called from Ur to Canaan, made covenant with God. Known for hospitality, faith, and the binding of Isaac. Wandering tent-dweller who became ancestor of multitudes.

journeying-forth.name: Journeying Forth
journeying-forth.description: Setting out on the journey from Ur - the original leap of faith
journeying-forth.expression: determined faith, eyes on distant horizon
journeying-forth.prompt: walking forward with staff in hand - robes flowing with movement, looking toward distant unseen land, leaving everything behind, the posture of faith stepping into unknown, caravan silhouette behind him

covenant-stars.name: Counting the Stars
covenant-stars.description: Looking up at the night sky, receiving God's promise
covenant-stars.prompt: standing beneath vast starry sky - head tilted back, arms slightly raised in wonder, countless stars visible above, the moment of receiving infinite promise, desert night surrounding him

welcoming-visitors.name: Welcoming Visitors
welcoming-visitors.description: The hospitality of Abraham - running to greet the three angels
welcoming-visitors.prompt: bowing in welcome with arms extended - tent visible behind, generous hospitable posture, rushing to greet visitors, the model of hospitality, joy at receiving guests

here-i-am.name: Here I Am
here-i-am.description: The posture of complete readiness - Hineni
here-i-am.prompt: standing at attention with open hands - face lifted slightly, posture of complete availability, ready for whatever is asked, the embodiment of 'Hineni' - here I am

father-patriarch.name: Father of Nations
father-patriarch.description: The patriarch in his fullness - blessing the generations
father-patriarch.prompt: standing as noble patriarch - long white beard, hands raised in blessing, the dignity of the father of nations, tent camp spreading behind him, embodying legacy and covenant

binding-isaac.name: The Ultimate Test
binding-isaac.description: On Mount Moriah - the moment of greatest faith
binding-isaac.prompt: on mountaintop with knife raised but staying hand - the most difficult moment, face showing both obedience and relief, altar visible, the ultimate test of faith about to be resolved
